trend_summary: Over the image series, built-up strips along the north-south arterial road become wider and more continuous, industrial estates enlarge in the south, and several forest patches shrink. New housing blocks infill open lots, while some small parks and sports fields appear. Overall growth is steady but moderated by remaining green hillsides.
notable_changes: Progressive widening and paving of the main northâ€“south corridor with denser roadside construction.
Expansion of southern industrial/commercial zone into former vegetated land.
Infill residential development on previously open or low-rise lots throughout the central belt.
Noticeable reduction of scattered forest patches, especially on mid-eastern slopes.
Creation or refurbishment of small recreational greens (sports fields/parks) amid housing.
